mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${shardTableName} ( APP_NAME, SERVICE, CONSUMER_IP, PROVIDER_IP, TIME, SUCCESS_TIMES, FAIL_TIMES, ELAPSED_AVG, ELAPSED_MAX, SUCCESS_TIMES_DETAIL, FAIL_TIMES_DETAIL, ELAPSED_TOTAL_DETAIL, ELAPSED_MAX_DETAIL ) SELECT #{appName}, #{service}, #{consumerIP}, #{providerIP}, #{time}, #{successTimes}, #{failTimes}, #{elapsedAvg}, #{elapsedMax}, #{successTimesDetail}, #{failTimesDetail}, #{elapsedTotalDetail}, #{elapsedMaxDetail} from DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ${shardTableName} t WHERE APP_NAME = #{appName} AND SERVICE = #{service} AND CONSUMER_IP = #{consumerIP} AND PROVIDER_IP = #{providerIP} AND TIME = #{time} )
